name: Healthy Snacks
lyric:
Innkeeper：

Howdy partner

Welcome to the Dusty Bowl Café

What do they call you
Cowboy：
They call me Hungry Slim

I've been riding all day

I'll be riding all night

I need some healthy snacks to keep me in the saddle
Innkeeper：
Ohhh you're in luck

Today's special is an old shoe with ketchup on it

Mighty tasty

Cowboy：
Ohhh not exactly what
I'm looking for

What else you got
Innkeeper：
Well I got a bag of sweets here

I can pour it right on your tongue

What do you say
Cowboy：
I think you'd better listen to this song

Hit it boys

Give me an apple
Some crackers and cheese

A big bad banana

Or some celery

How 'bout some popcorn

A cup of hot soup

Everybody's snacking on healthy foods
I need good food to keep me in the saddle
I need good food to send me on my way

Good food

Yippee Ki Yo Ki Ayyyyyyy

Give me an orange

Some granola mix

A peanut butter sandwich
Or some tuna fish

How 'bout some oatmeal

Cold milk or fresh juice

Everybody's snacking on healthy foods
I need good food to keep me in the saddle
I need good food to send me on my way

Good food

Yippee Ki Yo Ki Ayyyyyyy

I love the feel of my saddle

And the tug of the reins

A campfire at night

On the vast open plains

The sound of my horse

Going clickity clack

And the taste of a healthy

Cowboy snack
I need good food to keep me in the saddle
I need good food to send me on my way

Good food

Yippee Ki Yo Ki Ayyyyyyy

Good food
Yippee ki yo yippee ki ay

Good food
Yippee ki yo yippee ki ay

Healthy food
Yippee ki yo yippee ki ay

Healthy food
Yippee ki yo yippee ki ay

Give me an apple

Some crackers and cheese

A big bad banana
Or some celery

How 'bout some popcorn

A cup of hot soup

Everybody's snacking on healthy foods
I need good food to keep me in the saddle
I need good food to send me on my way

Good food

Yippee Ki Yo Ki Ayyyyyyy
